comments.author: jo mama

comments.text:
I don't mean to be a downer, but it is impossible to get pregnant from oral 
sex, because the egg has to meet a sperm, that is how fertilisation 
happens. No amount of saliva will have that effect.
Also, and I can say this from the experience of my mother and my friend, 
your hair doesn't get fuller. The body need more nutrients to make the 
baby, so it takes them from the mother. If the mother is not receiving a 
sufficient amount of nutrients, her hair WILL start to fall out, because 
the body has to prioritise when it comes to the distribution of the 
nutrients and making hair is a lower priority than, say, maintaining a 
liver function. Your nails and skin may also suffer.﻿

comments.text:
+Fame _Assasin Actually, if you did a little more listening in biology 
class, you'd know that the X chromosome is active in a fetus before the Y 
chromosome is, even though males have the Y chromosome, it does not 
activate until a few weeks into pregnancy, which is why people say we were 
all female until the Y chromosome is chemically turned on to produce all 
the "male" attributes to the physiology, eforehand, they start to develop 
as female. However, yes, genetically, they are still male
comments.author: Katherine Pileski

comments.text:
Actually if you learned science and listened to all your life science 
teachers you'd know that the genes created who you are today so you didn't 
start off a girl that's actually a myth.If your dad passes a x chromosome 
and your mom passes an x chromosome then you are a girl but If your dad 
passed a Y and your mom an X then your a boy.

adults to actually make a fetus, teens not as much but they still have to 
be nearly perfect.

comments.text:
There is actually almost a 0% chance you can get pregnant from oral sex. 
Just like Irishgriffin mentioned, it was from a weird stabbing that I still 
don't really understand. There is actually a small chance of anyone getting 
pregnant from vaginal sex. The egg is only viable for up to 24hr before you 
have to wait for the next cycle (about a month). Basically only 1 day out 
of the month that you can get pregnant. Oral sex is pretty nasty though, 
the mouth is a very dirty, bacteria filled place.
